SELECT NOTICE_ID ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CONTENTS ,REG_ID ,REG_DT ,MOD_ID ,MOD_DT FROM tb_notice WHERE 1=1
AND LOWER(NOTICE_TITLE) LIKE LOWER('%${noticeTitle}%')
AND REG_DT >= CONCAT(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00')
AND REG_DT <= CONCAT(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59')
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex};
